definition: despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，月光洗去了今晚天際中星星們昏暗的光。

sentences.english: Plus, although she's a vampire, she doesn't go around killing innocent humans.
sentences.chinese: 最後，儘管她是一名吸血鬼，她並沒有濫殺無辜人類。

sentences.english: Be that as it may， the nerve poison does its business with man far more quickly than the blood poison.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，神經毒液毒殺人類比血毒液快得多。

sentences.english: If you believe Sony it's still the best camera even without OIS.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信索尼儘管沒有光學防抖仍然是最好的相機。

sentences.english: However, Massimo Ambronisi equalized in the 25th minute for Milan.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，安布羅西尼在25分鐘爲米蘭扳平了比分。

sentences.english: While this is particularly true for primary cells, this technique can also be used for secondary cells.
sentences.chinese: 儘管對於原電池是這樣，該技術還可以用於蓄電池。

sentences.english: Despite living in freshwater, it is also resembles marine turtles.
sentences.chinese: 儘管豬鼻龜生活在淡水中，它同時又很像海龜。

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 儘管來日方長，但是及早打算總沒錯。

sentences.english: For all its troubles, it seems that the US is still the real Middle Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 儘管危機重重，美國似乎仍是真正的“中央王國”。

sentences.english: Despite all my efforts to persuade him, he wouldn't agree.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我盡力說服他，可他就是不同意。

sentences.english: Although De Gang can blame the sea aloud, but he is same however ashamed is right Chun Yan.
sentences.chinese: 儘管德綱可以大聲責備大海，但他卻一樣愧對春顏。

sentences.english: Although the farm is large, my Dad has two men working for him.
sentences.chinese: 儘管農場較大，我爸爸只僱了兩個人幫他幹活。

sentences.english: Susan: Because, I have a lot of things to say so you can just listen.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我有很多話要說，你儘管聽便是了。

sentences.english: Let me reassure you that it's standard practice.
sentences.chinese: 有關那一點，請您儘管放心好了。

sentences.english: And in spite of its being winter I would perspire all over.
sentences.chinese: 儘管這時還是冬天，我卻渾身都被汗溼透。

sentences.english: I will lend you all the few books that I can spare.
sentences.chinese: 我願把我能不用的書都借給你，儘管這些書爲數不多。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to declare to be untrue/to deny
